title: InterroLang: Exploring NLP Models and Datasets through Dialogue-based Explanations. (arXiv:2310.05592v2 [cs.CL] UPDATED)
abstract: While recently developed NLP explainability methods let us open the black box in various ways (Madsen et al., 2022), a missing ingredient in this endeavor is an interactive tool offering a conversational interface. Such a dialogue system can help users explore datasets and models with explanations in a contextualized manner, e.g. via clarification or follow-up questions, and through a natural language interface. We adapt the conversational explanation framework TalkToModel (Slack et al., 2022) to the NLP domain, add new NLP-specific operations such as free-text rationalization, and illustrate its generalizability on three NLP tasks (dialogue act classification, question answering, hate speech detection). To recognize user queries for explanations, we evaluate fine-tuned and few-shot prompting models and implement a novel Adapter-based approach. translated_title: InterroLang: 通过对话式解释探索NLP模型和数据集
translated_abstract: 最近发展的NLP可解释性方法以各种方式打开了黑箱，但是在这一努力中缺少的是提供对话界面的交互工具。这样的对话系统可以帮助用户以情境化的方式通过澄清或后续问题，并通过自然语言接口探索具有解释的数据集和模型。我们将对话式解释框架TalkToModel（Slack等，2022）改编为NLP领域，增加了自由文本解释等新的NLP特定操作，并展示了它在三个NLP任务（对话行为分类，问答，仇恨言论检测）上的泛化能力。为了识别用户的解释查询，我们评估了精调和少样本提示模型，并实施了一种新颖的基于适配器的方法。然后我们进行了两个用户研究：（1）评估对话的正确性和有用性，（2）可模拟性，即如何对象化用户对话。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种名为InterroLang的对话式解释工具，通过对话界面帮助用户以情境化的方式探索具有解释的NLP模型和数据集，支持澄清和后续问题，并通过自然语言接口进行交互。研究中还提出了新的NLP操作，并在三个NLP任务上展示了其泛化能力。进行了用户研究评估工具的正确性、有用性和可模拟性。
